subject: Re: Help with the integration of JUnit with JBuilder 6 Personal
msgSnippet: The solution I ve used is to simple create a public static void main ( String[] args ) method for the TestCase, so that the TestCase can be run as an
messageBody:
The solution I've used is to simple create a public static void main
( String[] args ) method for the TestCase, so that the TestCase can
be run as an application. Then, in the body of the main method,
invoke TestRunner.run( Class ) passing the TestCase being developed
as the Class argument. It's not the nice integration that is
available with the Enterprise edition, but it's still pretty easy.
